item.title: Creating A Command For 99 In a Skill with another 99
item.dc:creator: @ghost_dude ghost dude
item.description:
@ghost_dude wrote:

Creds To Recker450 For the command (Rep + If You Want But i DID NOT MAKE THIS)
Basically after a command IE. ::Master Add
Code: [Select]
if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("#####") && playerLevel[##] >= 99) {
addSkillXP(486000000, ##);
sendMessage(“You Have Mastered The Skill Of Attack Using ::Attack”);
} else {
sendMessage(“You need 99 cooking to master attack.”);
}
Replace the first set of 5 hashes ##### with your command name and Replace the first set of 2 hashes ## With your Skill ID That you want as the required level 99 skill
replace the second set of 2 hashes ## with your skill ID that you want level 99
and edit the name of the skills as wanted

NOTE:If using Delta Base Replace sendMessage with sM

PS:Sorry its sloppy tut my first one

Read full topic
item.source: Creating A Command For 99 In a Skill with another 99
